info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 11 at 11:51PM CDT until June 12 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Austin/San Antonio TX
info.description:
TOREWX
The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... West central Bexar County in south central Texas...
* Until 1215 AM CDT.
* At 1151 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Helotes, or 10 miles west of San Antonio, moving east at 10 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... San Antonio, San Antonio Int Airport, Leon Valley, Helotes, Shavano Park, Hollywood Park, Sea World, Lackland AFB, Government Canyon State Natural Area, Castle Hills, Balcones Heights, and Hill Country Village.
info.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 12:15 AM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 12:15 AM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 12:15 AM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 12:15 AM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
